A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The key to this film is that it's NOT going to help you relive your childhood. If you're going into this film expecting that... you're going to be disappointed. This film plays around with the pre-established lore and presents us with an excellent sequel to The Force Awakens. \n\nHonestly... this film is going into my top 4 or 3 Star Wars films\, definitely scooting in above TFA.
